text: @NYGovCuomo We have useful, legal, compassionate drugs fda approved for other dx, used successfully covid19 in this and other countries.  No reason 15 days later in cytokine storm to initiate then claim“fouled variable clinical study” claim they don’t work.  It’s 24-48 hour immediate treat.
